description: In honor of Dr. Sandra Mackey, a leading Middle East expert and author of six acclaimed books, this scholarship recognizes graduate students in the Master of Arts - International Affairs program who exemplifies high academic achievement and class standing. Eligibility Requirements Minimum 3.0 GPA Graduate in Master of Arts, Political Science-International Affairs program Continuing student for the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Political Science-Intnl Affair   or SIS_Major is Political Science-Intnl Affair   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Political Science-Intnl Affair   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Political Sci-Intnl Relations   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Political Science-Intnl Affair   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Political Sci-Intnl Relations
